text: My child was in Haven through both infant and playgroup levels. The teachers are lovely and provided a wholesome environment for my child to thrive. He absolutely loved going to school and has shown tremendous growth.

We couldn't be happier with our son's experience at this daycare! Every day, he is so excited to go to school and meet his wonderful teachers and classmates. It’s amazing to see how much he has grown socially—he’s become so much more sociable and confident, and we have the school to thank for that!

This place is more than just a daycare. The teachers do an incredible job teaching him things I wouldn’t be able to at home, from creative activities to learning about different cultures. The teachers and principal are fantastic, and you can really see how much they care about the kids' development. Highly recommend!
Our experience with Haven at Tanjong Pagar has been very pleasant. From infant to PG, the staff there are attentative and patient. The location is perfect for residents near Tanjong Pagar area.

Haven Infant & Toddler Centre at Tanjong Pagar is a hidden gem. Love that the teachers are sincere, they genuinely care for the children and one can sense the overall good vibes there. The teachers provide feedback and consistent updates which ensure we are kept-informed. my boy is happy going to school as seen from how he's all smiles during drop-offs almost every morning. A BIG thank you to the teachers there for taking such good care of my boy :) and a shout-out to the principal for always being so helpful and understanding.

Thank you to Haven and the teachers for taking good care of my boy, and helping him transition to school when he first joined. Haven also regularly organises school trips and celebrations, and it’s nice that they invite parents to join our babies for these events.
